page.title: 03STAFF NUMBERS AND FACILITIES
page.content: The number of staff employed by the hospital totals 361, of whom 280 are resident and 81 come from nearby towns and villages. { Administration and Finance = 31 { Medical and Nursing Staff = 173 { Medical Auxiliaries = 15 { Laboratory Staff = 9 { Supplies Department = 5 { Domestic Department = 53 { Porters and Gardeners = 17 { Catering Department = 14 { Laundry/Linen Room = 13 { Chaplains, Social Worker, ) { Librarian, Telephonists, ) = 10 { Shop Assistants, Drivers ) { Engineering, Maintenance Staff = 21} Due to the hospital's comparative isolation the following facilities are provided:- shop, post-office, library, hairdressing, banking service, chapel, swimming pool, recreation hall.
